attributes.additional_details:
After the riots in the London and the impact social networking had on that, you would have thought social networking site such as Facebook would have been moderated better.

But yet there are still a number if sick groups on there, mocking children with disabilities, making sick jokes about dead baby's and a number of other disgusting pages. The latest one i have seen is called "Congratulations you have a beautiful baby boy! LOL jk it's a still born..." now this has been reported a number of times and yet its still to be deleted.

And its not just about that one page its about the thousands of other sick pages on there, its about time some sort of proper moderation was set up on these pages, maybe some sort of vetting process before they go live.

please lets get something done about it.
